subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jaromir Jagr, who was hit in the mouth by a stray high stick earlier in the game, got to smile his new crooked smile after scoring the go-ahead goal in the third period.
snippet: Jaromir Jagr, who was hit in the mouth by a stray high stick earlier in the game, got to smile his new crooked smile after scoring the go-ahead goal in the third period.
